ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_PARAGRAPH_1: Hi, I’m Viktor – a passionate programmer with a focus on efficient and elegant solutions. I’m inspired by the way IT offers creative approaches to solving complex problems. I see challenges as opportunities to learn and grow. My motivation comes from a constant drive to improve and explore new technologies. By adopting best practices and embracing continuous learning, I strive to deliver high‑quality solutions in every project.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_PARAGRAPH_2: Let's collaborate and build something remarkable together!

SKILLS.DESCRIPTION_TEXT: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience of using different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Encourage people to take a look and interact with your projects. Highlight your approach to creating responsive, user-friendly projects with efficient code.

JOIN.TITLE: Join
JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

ELPOLLOLOCOGAME.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
ELPOLLOLOCOGAME.DESCRIPTION: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

DABUBBLE.TITLE: DaBubble
DABUBBLE.DESCRIPTION: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

TESTIMONIAL_1.TEXT: Viktor is a highly skilled developer with great attention to detail. His problem-solving abilities and collaborative approach make him an excellent team member.

TESTIMONIAL_2.TEXT: Working with Viktor has been a pleasure. He consistently delivers high-quality code and is always willing to help others learn and grow.

TESTIMONIAL_3.TEXT: Viktor's technical expertise and dedication to clean code are impressive. He brings innovative solutions to complex challenges and mentors junior developers effectively.

CONTACT.DESCRIPTION_PARAGRAPH_1: Encourage people to contact you and describe what role you are interested in. Express confidence in your ability to make a meaningful contribution to a team through your expertise and enthusiasm for improving your skills.
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION_PARAGRAPH_2: Show interest in contributing to a new project, while highlighting the value and skills you can bring to the table.
